# Access Token

Quando temos sucesso no fluxo de obter um access token o **authorization server** retorna um _json_ com algumas informações, sendo uma delas o **access token** de fato.


## Access Token Response
```json
{
  "access_token": "eyJhbGciOiJSUzI1NiIsInR5cCIgOiAiSldUIiwia2lkIiA6ICJKcjRIbkRqbnpFdm9XMS14QUJmQnNIUTdPS0g1bkNHRFlFR0NVTm5MZC1NIn0..Jetp3X2RjxQLY1nRythsZ2t3eAQ4WALc2tVYAKUaowD_---GDoALMHG2Im7w3g-HcKyhThYY-r92fMc_tmE2LW8Dn9dciO6ceIYoB8IstvbGYIapLkMyNzDprGdq43_vtgx5YMmZ5RaL_idVqeGszKQrSR0cucPXPMJ9SFzILEysaD0txIWyxfFNxL3Sl8jk62BX207Xe4uRSXSMxkLf1pDe398RmPK5nkXNKlQdQ9atHKH8MHXTclLi3Mdd5bbU1SLwxYU4iJ14KoLwD6qMdnZ5U540YX7NuJWplqAxHt9a2FnGJUm6W_bgz3y87rFd8sHe13LQ_cBWOGSpJx2xZA",
  "expires_in": 300,
  "refresh_expires_in": 0,
  "token_type": "Bearer",
  "id_token": "eyJhbGciOiJSUzI1NiIsInR5cCIgOiAiSldUIiwia2lkIiA6ICJKcjRIbkRqbnpFdm9XMS14QUJmQnNIUTdPS0g1bkNHRFlFR0NVTm5MZC1NIn0..cPSW4FnlcBkgcG5yf0G83Eb3hwGCd4ul989LhNIq6900dW-fcoriH4LQhOCQRPiYohpV4nXakQiDFhTz5LOlsPLNGS1l9JuJlEkfjRgl4EHwv5uUy7RyfsnTlg4xvdDufEbiscRmHBbF6ocFgAmB-Vzf81_g9zXpi8qLIa_WWF0PIwToyi33SMkLRS7vXSak0sJalHHa2vuW4UBXjo6Pg0ha2soeSgYlzutAdATYYAIGwK7hvtA8JyVeQluv5uxCycu1y4Haf1_N12N6Sb1W_vEWEP9NuCrwuRM_8tWA7se44knZ0ZIpQ_D-KIaij6liWppEzWx_SM7Vqhrsq170kA",
  "scope": "openid profile email"
}
```
